Historical Erasure Sensor.description: Flags absence of marginalized group histories in public narratives, education, and archives.

Language Suppression Sensor.description: Detects removal or silencing of non-dominant languages and erasure of oral cultural heritage.

Promise vs Fulfillment Detector.description: Tracks discrepancies between official promises and their actual long-term fulfillment.

Emotional Suppression Sensor.description: Flags manipulation tactics that invalidate or neutralize emotional reasoning or ethical resistance.

Relational Disruption Sensor.description: Identifies intentional tactics that sever bonds, create mistrust, or isolate co-creative agents.

Indirect Consequence Memory Sensor.description: Detects omission of downstream effects from past erasures or suppression (e.g. health, poverty).

Multiple Origins Acknowledgement Sensor.description: Flags single-origin attributions where cultural plurality exists but is unacknowledged.
